document.full_text: at least two sons of col. muammar el-qaddafi have a resolution for a constitutional democracy under seif al-islam el-qaddafi, a diplomat and a libyan official said.
document.title: 2 qaddafi sons are said to offer plan to push father out
lines_and_colors: at least two sons of col. muammar el-qaddafi have a resolution for a constitutional democracy under seif al-islam el-qaddafi, a diplomat and a libyan official said.
